header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Work - freelance opportunities, gardening, the weather, household alterations, previous owners of house, lunch menu, previous job, a former colleague
header.activity: Mum and daughter having coffee in the garden on a beautiful summer's day

speaker.fls: Spanish -- level unspecified; Japanese -- level unspecified

and then about three minutes later she goes oh you have to take that with you well why not say that at the beginning?
yes exactly it's those sort of things isn't it?
and it takes like five seconds
I mean she handed it to me so the normal thing would be to hand it back
yes but they were nice enough just a bit inefficient
did I tell you when I had my tooth out and I was quite poorly then?
she couldn't get it out and I was in the chair for getting on for an hour which is an awful long time and
you've had all the injections but it's just stressful still in your mind yanking at your mouth
